title: Prescription Drugs and Alternative Medicine - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/17
itunes:title: Prescription Drugs and Alternative Medicine - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/27/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dr. Andrew Weil discuss the over prescription of dangerous medication, and whether alternative medicine is a safer choice to improve your health.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
